Body.Content:
We are excited to announce a new icon for Microsoft Intune, which will be updated across all platforms and apps associated with Intune such as the Intune admin center and Intune Company Portal app. This change aims to provide a fresh and modern look to enhance user experience. The rollout of the new icon will begin in late April 2025 and will be gradually implemented over the next few months.

How this will affect your organization:

There is no impact on your organization's operations. Admins will see the updated icon in the Intune admin center, Intune for Education portal, Azure portal and more. Users will simply see the updated icon for the Microsoft Intune and Intune Company Portal apps.

What you need to do to prepare:

Update your documentation to reflect the new icon (above) and notify users about this change as needed.

Title: Plan for Change: New icon for Microsoft Intune
